title: Ive had it with this matchmaking bullshit
body: You have one day where you win every single game and you check and your matched with people around your MMR. Then the next day you are matched with people who arent even close PLUS you get trolls on your team who legit try but {{champion:16}} TOP IS NOT A FUCKING THING AND {{champion:20}} IS THE WORST SUPPORT YOU CAN PICK.

replies.body: Actually, {{champion:11}} is far, far worse than {{champion:20}} as a support.
